summary: Digital Detox mobile app to help users reduce screen time, improve focus, and build healthy digital habits through tracking, challenges, rewards, and AI-powered insights
architectural_notes: React Native or Flutter for cross-platform mobile app
Local notifications for reminders and alerts
App usage tracking with device permissions
Dark mode with calm blue and soft purple theme
Firestore schema: users collection with uid, name, email, dailyLimit, currentScreenTime, streak, totalPoints, level, challenges[], focusSessions[], createdAt
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Calming welcome illustration with abstract waves and gradients in calm blue and soft purple tones (welcome-hero.dim_800x600.png)
- Success celebration animation frame showing sparkles and achievement badge in purple and blue gradient (success-celebration.dim_400x400.png)

existing_features.title: Create an onboarding flow with a welcome screen that collects: average daily screen time, biggest distraction apps (text input), main goal (dropdown with options: Reduce addiction, Improve focus, Sleep better), daily screen time limit, and preferred focus duration

Build a home dashboard showing: today's screen time, remaining allowed time, progress bar visualization, current streak count, dynamic motivational quote that changes daily, 'Start Focus Session' button, and 'Join Challenge' button

Implement a Focus Mode feature with timer options (25 minutes, 45 minutes, Custom), countdown animation, warning popup if user attempts to exit early, and on completion: award points, show success animation, and increase streak counter

Create a Digital Detox Challenges system with pre-built challenges: '7-Day Detox', 'No Social Media Sunday', '2 Hours No Phone Before Sleep', plus the ability to create custom challenges. Track completion percentage, daily progress, and award bonus points on completion
Build a Statistics & Analytics page with daily, weekly, and monthly charts showing: screen time comparison, focus hours tracked, streak history, and improvement percentage over time

Implement a rewards and gamification system with a points mechanism, level progression (Beginner, Consistent, Focused Mind, Digital Master), unlockable badges, and a visual progress tracker showing current level and points to next level

Create an AI Smart Assistant feature that analyzes user usage patterns and provides personalized suggestions including: best focus time recommendations, detox tips, app usage warnings, and a daily personalized notification
Build a reminder system that alerts users when screen time limit is approaching, sends a gentle 'Time to disconnect ðŸŒ™' notification at night, and allows custom reminder scheduling
Create a Settings page with options to: edit screen time limit, change theme (with Dark Mode as default), control notification preferences, reset all data, and logout

Apply a cohesive visual design with a calm blue and soft purple color palette as the default dark mode theme, minimalistic layout using soft rounded cards, smooth transitions and minimal animations throughout the app, modern typography, and clean bottom navigation

new_feature_requests.summary: Onboarding flow with user preferences and goal setting
Home dashboard with screen time tracking and progress visualization
Focus Mode with timer, app blocking, and streak rewards
Digital Detox Challenges system with pre-built and custom challenges
Rewards & Gamification system with points, levels, and badges
AI Smart Assistant for usage analysis and personalized suggestions
Settings page with theme control and account management
Firebase Authentication with Email and Google login

Replace the current health-focused backend with a user management system that stores: uid, name, email, dailyLimit (number), currentScreenTime (number), streak (number), totalPoints (number), level (text), challenges (array), focusSessions (array), and createdAt (timestamp)
